alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto, northwestern Marshall, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Germantown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Cordova, Memphis, Southeast Memphis, Piperton, Cayce, Elba, Parkway Village, White Station, Handy Corner, Capleville and Kirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
